effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user takes revenge for a fainted ally. This move's power is boosted if an ally fainted in the previous turn.
